name: budget-app
description: Full-Stack Budget App with Express/TypeScript backend and React/TypeScript frontend

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test -- --passWithNoTests
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format:all: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
